answers.answer: Have you been having tummy pain aswell? Any swelling in your hands and feet?
Then it doesn't sound serious, if it continues call your GP or your midwife and arrange an appointment. If you are worried baby isnt moving well also phone

Take it easy. I had the same for two days in a row a few weeks back but I didn't have swelling or anything either & my blood pressure was fine. Doctor told me I needed to rest and not stress out. If you do get swelling, unbearable headaches, or tummy pains you need to go get checked for pre clampsia.

I seen on this one pregnancy show that this girl had diabetes and she started having blurry vision to so she went to the e.r and I forgot what she had but they said it was serious.  I'm not saying you have this but maybe you should go to the hospital and get checked outGood luck to you momma.
I had the same thing. I was severely dehydrated you should go to er

I wear glasses and they're brand new. I had them for 2 maybe 3 months and since my third trimester began I had blurry vision while watching TV. This never happened to me even before pregnancy. I was told by my midwife that it's common and a lot happens when your pregnant but talk to my eye doctor if it worsen
Im just going to go to the er im only 10 weeks it shouldn be this bad
Give you fluids. I've been 6 times for dehydration and in 19 weeks
Did yu have black spots an blury visions??

I have black spots blurry vision and dizziness .. iv had it with my pregnancies pretty much the whole time .. my dr told me it was just increased hormones and blood flow .. if u need to ease ur mind though go get checked .. always better to be safe

question: Been seening black spots an haveing blurry vision for the last to days what does it mean
title: help!!
